name: Portfolio website
description: I created a website using React and Sass where I display my works and my professional journey, from starting in Design and Multimedia Animation, becoming a Pastry Chef in 3 different countries and now as a fullstack Developer.

name: Dashing Dragons game
description: Dashing Dragons is a two-player online, co-op shooting game. The game gets progressively harder each round as the speed of the enemies increases.

name: Game board reviews
description:
Game board reviews is a webpage.
 Each review has user curated ratings and can be up or down voted using the API. Users can also add comments about a review.

name: House of games API
description: I built an API for the purpose of accessing application data programmatically. This database is done in PSQL, and interacted with, by using node-postgres.
